import { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { delUser } from '../../store/actions' import Button from '../UI/Button/Button' import './UserItem.css' export default function UserItem({ id, name, email, changeStateOfModal, setModal, modal }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [input, setInput] = useState(false) return ( < li className = "list-item" >

{name}

{email}
) }
